name: part_000
file: tmp_【#マリン船長の番組】2周年記念に地獄企画いくつかやりました【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】 [tV0vI7Aflho]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening sequence for 'Captain Marine's Show' featuring high-energy music and visual announcements.
Title cards for the 2nd Anniversary Drama and the show name.
Opening theme song performance 'Sasakure Kinema' with drama credits displayed over aerial scenery.
Episode 1 of the drama: Sakura Miko is in a lab completing a mysterious potion when Houshou Marine arrives to invite her out.

subtitles.original: マリン船長の番組
subtitles.english: Captain Marine's Show

subtitles.original: マリンの劇場 2周年記念ドラマ
subtitles.english: Marine's Theater: 2nd Anniversary Drama

subtitles.original: #マリン船長の番組 Captain Marine's Show
subtitles.english: #Captain Marine's Show

subtitles.original: 昼ドラホロライブ
subtitles.english: Hololive soap opera

subtitles.original: 一夜限りと飛び込んだ
subtitles.english: I dove in for just one night

subtitles.original: 古い旅館の2号室
subtitles.english: To room number two of an old inn

subtitles.original: 燃ゆる花火に照らされて
subtitles.english: Illuminated by the burning fireworks

subtitles.original: 睦言交わす熱帯夜
subtitles.english: Whispering sweet nothings on a tropical night

subtitles.original: 朝が来るまで側にいて
subtitles.english: Stay by my side until morning comes

subtitles.original: あの人のこと忘れたい
subtitles.english: I want to forget about that person

subtitles.original: 真夏の夜の泣き虫は
subtitles.english: The crybaby of the midsummer night

subtitles.original: 声を殺して鳴くのです
subtitles.english: Cries while stifling their voice

subtitles.original: 好きだから身を引くの
subtitles.english: I'm stepping back because I love you

subtitles.original: ささくれた美談丁度良い女って
subtitles.english: A frayed beautiful story, a 'just right' kind of woman

subtitles.original: こういうことなの？
subtitles.english: Is this what it means?

subtitles.original: 愛してる 愛してる 愛してる 愛してる
subtitles.english: I love you, I love you, I love you, I love you

subtitles.original: 幸せ探して三千里
subtitles.english: Searching for happiness across three thousand leagues

subtitles.original: シャラララ
subtitles.english: Sha-la-la-la

subtitles.original: 触れ合えど 触れ合えど 触れ合えど 触れ合えど
subtitles.english: Though we touch, though we touch, though we touch, though we touch

subtitles.original: 彷徨う運命が また恋に狂わせる
subtitles.english: Wandering fate drives me crazy in love again

subtitles.original: 第一話
subtitles.english: Episode 1

subtitles.original: 劣情の果て 曼交き出航
subtitles.english: Sailing away with the after-effects of lustful emotions

subtitles.original: お〜、あともう少しで出来るはずだにぇ。
subtitles.english: Oh, it should be done in just a bit.

subtitles.original: こうしてぇ…ああしてぇ…これをやってぇ…！
subtitles.english: Like this... like that... do this...!

subtitles.original: うわあああ！
subtitles.english: Whoa!

subtitles.original: これはああ！
subtitles.english: This is...!

subtitles.original: ついに完成したにぇ…！
subtitles.english: It's finally complete...!

subtitles.original: これが出回ればとんでもないことになるでぇ…あははは！
subtitles.english: Once this gets out, it's going to be a disaster... ahahaha!

subtitles.original: みこ部長〜❤️
subtitles.english: Miko-bucho~ ❤️

subtitles.original: おつかれサマンサ
subtitles.english: Thanks for the hard work, Samantha.

subtitles.original: やあマリンたん、今日も若作りしてるねぇ〜
subtitles.english: Hi Marine-tan, you're trying to look young again today, aren't you?

subtitles.original: は？
subtitles.english: Huh?

subtitles.original: キミもこんな時間まで仕事だったのかにぇ？
subtitles.english: Were you working until this late too?

subtitles.original: あの娘さんが心配してるんじゃないかな？
subtitles.english: I bet your daughter is worried.

subtitles.original: あ、あくあなら平気ですよっ
subtitles.english: Oh, Aqua will be fine.

subtitles.original: それよりぃ…
subtitles.english: More importantly...

subtitles.original: このあとどこか飲みに行きません〜？？
subtitles.english: Want to go for a drink after this?

subtitles.original: おぉいいにぇ…あの、ちょうど行ってみたいバーがあるんだよ
subtitles.english: Oh, that sounds good... Actually, there's a bar I've been wanting to try.

subtitles.original: 『休憩所』も…すぐそばにあるんだよね…
subtitles.english: There's also a 'rest area' right nearby...
